name: Lovebirds And Paperwork
description:
Lovebirds And Paperwork is an interactive fiction where the player takes control of a character called Dan. Throughout the story, the player will have to make choices that impact Dan's relationship with his girlfriend Sue as well as his work performance.

This interactive fiction is a project made by Elias Gustavsson and Ronja Korpela for an assignemnt in university.

Cover Art by Ronja Korpela
